person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A controlled exchange rate , trade liberalisation and tight monetary policies have also dramatically curbed inflation , making more money available for cosmetic surgery .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Cosmetic surgery patients (implied) |

The paragraph does not mention any specific persons by name. It only discusses the impact of economic policies on the availability of money for cosmetic surgery.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Cosmetic surgery patients (implied) |

The paragraph mentions "cosmetic surgery patients" as the implied recipient of the increased availability of money due to economic policies. Therefore, they are the only valid person entity in the paragraph.
